title: Consorting With Wizards (2R97)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Tale. Bearer must be Bilbo. Bilbo may not take wounds (except during the archery phase). Fellowship or Regroup: Exert Bilbo or discard this condition to remove (1).
Lore:	”'He wasn't always this peculiar! When I were a lad, old Bilbo was a most respectable Hobbit.'”
Rarity:	R
